member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS
member.summary: Flags used by to specify details of a known folder redirection such as permissions and ownership for the redirected folder.

member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS.KF_REDIRECT_USER_EXCLUSIVE
member.summary: Ensure that only the user has permission to access the redirected folder.

member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS.KF_REDIRECT_COPY_SOURCE_DACL
member.summary: Copy the DACL of the source folder to the target to maintain current access permissions.

member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS.KF_REDIRECT_OWNER_USER
member.summary: Sets the user as the owner of a newly created target folder unless the user is a member of the Administrator group, in which case Administrator is set as the owner. Must be called with KF_REDIRECT_SET_OWNER_EXPLICIT.

member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS.KF_REDIRECT_SET_OWNER_EXPLICIT
member.summary: Set the owner of a newly created target folder. If the user belongs to the Administrators group, Administrators is assigned as the owner. Must be called with KF_REDIRECT_OWNER_USER.

member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS.KF_REDIRECT_CHECK_ONLY
member.summary: Do not perform a redirection, simply check whether redirection has occurred. If so, returns S_OK; if not, or if some actions remain to be completed, it returns S_FALSE.

member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS.KF_REDIRECT_COPY_CONTENTS
member.summary: Copy the existing contents—both files and subfolders—of the known folder to the redirected folder.

member.name: KF_REDIRECT_FLAGS.KF_REDIRECT_DEL_SOURCE_CONTENTS
member.summary: Delete the contents of the source folder after they have been copied to the redirected folder. This flag is valid only if is set.
